data.text: Yaa obboleettii ko, misirrittii ko,  ani dhufee biqiltuu koo seeneera;
Ani rafeera; garaan koo garuu dammaqeera.
Ani uffata koo of irraa baaseera;
Michuun koo qaawwa balbalaatiin harka galche;
Ani michuu kootiif balbala banuuf nan kaʼe;
Ani michuu kootiif balbala nan bane;
Eegdonni utuu magaalaa keessa naannaʼanuu na argan.
Yaa ishee dubartoota hunda caalaa bareeddu,
Mataan isaa warqee akka malee qulqulluu dha;
Iji isaa akkuma gugee burqaa bishaanii biraa
Maddiin isaa akkuma madabii biqiltuu urgooftuu kan shittoo baasuu ti.
Dubbiin isaa waan hunda caalaa miʼaawaa dha;
